short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically like new songs playing on https://app.rvrb.one

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enabling this extension will automatically like any RVRB song which is currently playing, allowing likes to be distributed for each song as it is played. Not affiliated with the RVRB core developer team.
